  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="12192" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="12192" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.94</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="7260">7,260</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="815"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Neroli Portofino</b> by <b>Tom Ford</b> is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men. <b>Neroli Portofino</b> was launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Rodrigo Flores-Roux. Top notes are Bergamot, Mandarin Orange, Lemon, Bitter Orange, Lavender, Rosemary and Myrtle; middle notes are African Orange Flower, Neroli, Jasmine and Pitosporum; base notes are Amber, Angelica and Ambrette (Musk Mallow). </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="12192"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.75.jpg" style="width: 4.425rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bergamot-75.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bergamot</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.94590744661054; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.82.jpg" style="width: 3.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mandarin-Orange-82.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Mandarin Orange</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.89903623487364; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.77.jpg" style="width: 3.3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lemon-77.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lemon</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.87312766036198; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.79.jpg" style="width: 3.15rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Bitter-Orange-79.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Bitter Orange</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82555956097059; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 2.9rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; </pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.16.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Orange-Blossom-16.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>African Orange Flower</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.17.jpg" style="width: 4.375rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Neroli-17.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Neroli</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82555956097059; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.14.jpg" style="width: 2.9rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Jasmine-14.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Jasmine</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.90.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pittosporum-90.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Pitosporum</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.81007176538254; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.54.jpg" style="width: 2.825rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amber-54.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amber</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.76557320030326; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.44.jpg" style="width: 2.625rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Angelica-44.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Angelica</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.75965265410792; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.107.jpg" style="width: 2.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ambrette-Musk-Mallow--107.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ambrette (Musk Mallow)</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="12192"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='879fa003fd920e558a4f28e001803c61520' slotpayload='{"ct":"j1r2Av6MbBKqjl4fJB5tz\/IjQMntwf1jB2DItsMdqCs5Gmrfhg9IVmxlVy98iX2e7R4HaFw0rj+JF1xohUKBA2MN6JUsNtd4BYpkooaJuBRmj1Q8WgYf6kMV2Cpr0cg\/BPSfRz7QGRTeqTZ8ET+EoFq7pgXy7OxOtdTf3NSypQxf8BWLE6Lpus7twlYU5rGfcsS5p5G9ts6\/IVzlWPBVYSaa3PGqrpsh62mwZ9QKWHEqwerofeJW\/fBLkZmyo7MH\/boKS3ftXge405GRT1zStgvDrKNLAV6uka0RAoS+uMyfkrsTg8lF+eD1vTLGp2nw","iv":"241371ed85a93a8b4159942c37e10b3c","s":"0ca67fa58569921b"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

</div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="strike-title"><span><small>Collections</small> Private Blend Neroli Portofino </span></div><div class="carousel"><div class="carousel-cell"><a padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351960" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BowTieBeau"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2205713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BowTieBeau" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351960ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351960" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2205713">BowTieBeau</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 08:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beautiful aromatic/floral summer fragrance. This one, for me, was a blast of mint. It's a very elaborate, artisinal blend which does not smell cheap by any means, but I refuse to believe that the pricetag which this comes with is simply worth it. I would much more suggest something like French Riviera, Coach Green, or even 4711 which it seems to be consistenly compared to.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Smells like fruity pebbles to me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2347189"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2347189#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345575" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kaju23"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/632507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.632507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kaju23" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345575ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345575" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/632507">kaju23</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 13:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think you have to be really into Tom Ford to appreciate this one, to be honest the colour of the bottle already says what's inside - that's an aquatic lemon and flower buquet.<br />
<br />
Not sure how people may describe it anything over unisex, this is strongly a feminine scent. I got way more flowers than citruses, to the point it became suspicious if there's any of the bergamot/lemon/orange left after first 20 minutes.<br />
<br />
This is not the nauseating flowery potion, it is strong neroli, orange/bergamot and lavender freshie with a bit of aquatic twist.<br />
<br />
Going back to my initial statement, Tom Ford lovers will love it for keeping the separated notes natural-smelling and mixing it all into a fine combination, however those impartial to Tom Ford will tell you this is simple and not really that special. Both are correct, and both will fairly mark it as way overpriced.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2345575"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2345575#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

Incredibly indolic and nausea inducing. I have to leave the room everytime she sprays this and not come back which sucks cause shes awesome but the smell is repulsive</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2323811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2323811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321983" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321983" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="adychiy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171025"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2171025.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="adychiy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Flowerbomb-1460.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1460.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flowerbomb"title="Flowerbomb"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321983ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321983" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2171025">adychiy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 12:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful and lush citrusy scent. Neroli Portofino smells like sailing a boat during the summer in Italy whilst getting a tan and wearing white. Every perfume in Tom Fords private blend collection tells a story.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2321983"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2321983#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2320488" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320488" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NoirMemoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1329296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NoirMemoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Allsaints/Incense-City-61465.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61465.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Incense City"title="Incense City"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320488ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320488" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1329296">NoirMemoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-19">10/19/24 03:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Ford #1 - Triple distilled freshie, reference neroli.<br />
<br />
I managed to get my hands on a bunch of Tom Ford samples and i dip my toe into this house starting with Neroli Portofino. <br />
<br />
I called this a "triple distilled freshie" because its incredibly smooth and natural. Not a complicated scent but high quality for sure, a tale of citruses and neroli that create a soapy fresh and clean Riviera vibe. The scent of Neroli (or orange blossoms) is sometimes described as indolic, even fragrantica does so but i don't agree. To me it smells bitter and zingy. Neroli Portofino still has the bitterness but its refined and has absolutely no chemical harshness or roughness to it. <br />
<br />
I understand the association with Portofino, it smells very Italian, Mediterranean. The scent reminds me of those TikTok videos where a rich guy arrives in front of a 5 star hotel in his cabrio Ferrari or Lamborghini, dressed in a linen shirt and moccasins that cost 3 monthly wages. He hands the keys to the valet and is surrounded by supermodels that escort him into the lobby. <br />
<br />
I dared to call it reference neroli because the note is so naturally represented, and the whole composition is so well blended. It is a beautiful scent but i don't think its for the average fragrance consumer simply because its not enough bang for your buck. I sprayed it on my hand to get a first impression, just before going grocery shopping. Two hours later i can only faintly smell it. <br />
<br />
If i were to rate fragrances, this would score highly in terms of scent and quality but badly on performance and subsequently on price / value ratio, but that is a subjective matter isn't it?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2320488"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2320488#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312323" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rsnero680"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2024694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rsnero680" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024694">rsnero680</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 10:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had very high hopes but this smells like sunscreen to me. No citrus, no floral notes, just less chemical-smelling sunscreen.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2312323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2312323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296264" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frag-overdose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/494364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.494364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frag-overdose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Mugler-Cologne-Come-Together-50883.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50883.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mugler Cologne Come Together"title="Mugler Cologne Come Together"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296264ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296264" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/494364">frag-overdose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-26">09/26/24 17:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tom Ford Neroli Portofino is a quintessential scent for the year-long hot and humid Malaysian climate. With its bright, invigorating blend of neroli, citrus, and soapy aldehydic notes, it brings a burst of freshness that feels like a cool breeze on a scorching day. The fragrance opens with crisp lemon, bergamot, and mandarin, followed by a floral heart of neroli and orange blossom that exudes a "just-showered" cleanness. The soapy aldehydic undertone enhances this purity, making it feel sophisticated and polished.<br />
<br />
Wearing Neroli Portofino is like wrapping yourself in a veil of elegance and ease, ideal for a casual weekend or a leisurely brunch. Its uplifting scent instantly elevates the mood, making you feel vibrant and refreshed despite the intense humidity. Though its often labeled as an expensive indulgence, the way it envelops the senses with its artistry makes it worth the splurge. While there are many substitutes that attempt to replicate its sunny, Mediterranean vibe, none capture the same balance of refinement and energy. The happiness and confidence it inspires is a reminder that, sometimes, wearing an exquisite scent is simply about enjoying the moment and treating yourself to a piece of olfactory art.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2296264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2296264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292122" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2292122" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Olivertitus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182431"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Olivertitus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81642.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Elixir"title="Le Male Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2292122ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2292122" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2182431">Olivertitus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 01:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I take back  what I recently said about this perfume. It smells nothing but fresh and delicious. Very nice neroli and orange blossom. But the high price brings the value of the fragrance down.<br />
<br />
Longevity 6/10<br />
Sillage: 7/10<br />
Smell 9/10<br />
Value: 4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2292122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2292122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2286491" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Nobody wants to settle for anything less than nuclear performance nowadays</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2286491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2286491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285901" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There is no memory, because it faded quickly when I tested and for the price, this is disappointing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2285901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2285901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2283406" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="csirip"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2253385"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2253385.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="csirip" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2283406ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2283406" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); Nice and fresh, the jasmine gives it a bit of mysterious touch. Suits spring weather and as the days get warmer, this one just gets better. I enjoy this but I am not sure it is worth the price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2283406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2283406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2283265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; basil..absolutely 95% similar with so natural blend ...this is the type of fragrance which i love to wear anytime anywhere without any dilemma...love it </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I have a 3.4 oz bottle I'd love to swap/sell with someone who loves this and gets more nuance from it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2283159"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2283159#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2281870" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2281870" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ShiverMint"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ShiverMint" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2281870ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2281870" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2244747">ShiverMint</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-13">09/13/24 15:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've had Neroli Portofino for almost a decade now. It's a light and refreshing fragrance. It's not bold or in-your-face, it's just refreshing and pleasant and lasts on the skin subtly. It lasts quite a bit for such a light scent. Perfect for a subtropical Australian spring and summer.<br />
<br />
When I was first considering getting it, I had read that 4711 is much the same. As with most reviews, you can't account for people's taste (or sense of smell). To me, 4711 was more of a harsh, bitter citrus, which really put me off. Neroli Portofino is very smooth and was clearly very different, so I much prefer it. Not at all the same.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2281870"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2281870#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275483" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Are you kidding? His prices are ridiculous! Some of the newer clones these days have proven that high-quality doesn't need to cost more than $30 - $100! All those niche and designer houses have been price-gouging people for years, and it's high-time they get called out for it! Besides, considering the quality of this scent, if this product had a no-name label on it, people would be up in arms at the abominable $285 - $300+ pricetag! The Maison Alhambra clone smells better and lasts LONGER than this one does on skin AND clothes, and it's 1/10 of the price!!! The smell of Neroli Portofino is akin to a house that has just been cleaned. Tell me, what is attractive about that? Do women really want to get close to a  man who smells like cleaning products?<br />
<br />

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2173883">sniffy2807</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-23">08/23/24 23:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like some citrusy cleaning wipes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256451" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fragrance_Nolan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1947453.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fragrance_Nolan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256451ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256451" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1947453">Fragrance_Nolan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 13:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can understand the negative reviews but I personally do like Neroli Portofino. Maybe a bit outlandish for some but it actually reminds me of purple kool-aid, it smells very similar imo. I think the neroli smells great, but the jasmine brings down the scent a bit. I also think this is a bit mature-leaning, I don't think anyone will get a waft of this and think this a youthful scent. I'm starting to think Mandarino Di Amalfi might be the best fresh-frragrance that TF offers but Neroli Portofino might be second.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2256451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2256451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256408" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Welcome, that's what that perfume smells like. It's very fresh and citrusy, but I don't want to walk around smelling like a clean house.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2256408"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2256408#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2254619" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2250002" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ValZola"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2222502"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2222502.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ValZola" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2250002ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2250002" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); Nice scent but it's a shame it has such poor performance even for very citrusy floral perfumes, as I had mostly 1h to 2h of noticeable smell before it really fades away. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2241506" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JonaOls123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152914"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2152914.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JonaOls123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2241506ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2241506" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152914">JonaOls123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-07">08/07/24 04:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Neroli Portofino is an amazing fragrance for summer and spring wear. Its a perfect balance between bitter and floral notes. What stands out to me is the bitterness of the neroli in the dry down while still being fresh and floral. This will take you to the Italian riviera drinking a Campari in expensive clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2241506"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2241506#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237993" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So many of my friends were obsessed with this perfume. But well - first of all it lasts maybe 2 hours - at least the new release does. So embarrassing for the brand. I asked also   my partner (male) to test this - he sincerely disliked it, saying it reminds him too much on smell of urinal cakes. Passing this to a friend of mine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2237993"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2237993#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2236632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2236632" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ArmanPRFMS"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2156044"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2156044.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ArmanPRFMS" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2236632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2236632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2236632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2236632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2232380" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EmilZakaryan924"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2137868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EmilZakaryan924" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cartier/Pasha-de-Cartier-Parfum-59418.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59418.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pasha de Cartier Parfum"title="Pasha de Cartier Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2232380ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2232380" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137868">EmilZakaryan924</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 01:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Amazing fresh fragrance for the summer. Smells very nice as well. I got a sample of this and i tried it and liked it immediately. Starts off very citrusy, white floral and aromatic. Dry down is mostly the same as the opening. <br />
<br />
Lets talk about performance. Its pretty weak so i get around 3-4 hours with a soft projection, leaning unisex. I recommend this for the spring and summer because it is not strong enough to be worn in the colder seasons. <br />
<br />
Lastly, is it a safe blind buy? Yes it is. If you love clean, citrusy scents like this, then you will love this.<br />
<br />
In conclusion:<br />
Scent: 9/10<br />
Longevity: 4/10<br />
Projection: 3.5/10<br />
<br />
Tom Ford Neroli Portofino: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2232380"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2232380#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2228288" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2187539">Scentered111</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-14">07/14/24 17:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like Banana Boat spray on sunscreen on me. Anyone else get the same effect?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2218736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2218736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218312" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218312" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bread6602"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2148915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bread6602" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218312ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218312" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148915">Bread6602</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-14">07/14/24 08:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>TF Neroli Portofino is so close to being a masterpiece of a fragrance. The scent of the fragrance is spectacular! It opens with beautiful citruses but still has a dense aspect to it which invokes luxury. The scent is not too bitter but also not too sweet. This fragrance transports you to a private beach in the Mediterranean at sunset while you sip on a luxurious wine in very expensive clothing. <br />
<br />
The one thing that destroys this fragrance is the performance. It has very weak staying power! I would say about 2 hours longevity with maybe 30 minutes of decent projection before it stays close to the skin. The scent totally vanishes from the skin within 3-4 hours. <br />
<br />
I love this fragrance! it would easily be a spring and summer signature scent if the performance was not so bad! For this reason, I will sadly not be purchasing another bottle once i finish my current one. <br />
<br />
Longevity: 3/10<br />
Projection: 2/10<br />
Smell: 10/10<br />
Price: 2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2218312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2218312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217354" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mortal7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1338012"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1338012.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mortal7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/Grand-Soir-40816.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40816.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grand Soir"title="Grand Soir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1338012">Mortal7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 06:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I already had Creeds Original Vetiver and was curious about the comparison with Tom Fords Neroli Portofino. Now I have both so I made a side-by-side comparison.  Both are superb perfumes which bring clean, fresh summer vibes. The opening minutes are very similar, but then the NP quickly develops into a fruity orange scent whereas the OV gets distinctively sandal/cedar woody. Of the 2 Id say that NP has a slightly stronger and longer projection, but not that big of a difference. If I could only keep one it would be a very hard choice for me, but leaning towards the NP at the moment.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2217354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2217354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215321" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215321" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ikealegs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191589"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2191589.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ikealegs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12192.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Neroli Portofino"title="Neroli Portofino"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215321ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215321" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); Just a shame that I cant seem to find portofino acqua anymore :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2215321"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2215321#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210966" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196248" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="austinmdpedi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2073655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2073655.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="austinmdpedi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196248ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196248" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2196248"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2196248#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194230" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194230" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sugarcane"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/46643"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.46643.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sugarcane" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Fucking-Fabulous-46513.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46513.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fucking Fabulous"title="Fucking Fabulous"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194230ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194230" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/46643">sugarcane</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 10:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wonderful. A couple things here. <br />
<br />
I made the mistake of originally basing my idea of this fragrance off of a dupe. I bought a dupe from a well known dupe house and did not like it at all. The dupe was pure neroli. <br />
<br />
I had the inkling and the funds to purchase the real thing about a month ago. The real thing is absolutely perfect. It smells like high class summer. The scent brings the feeling of sitting poolside without a care in the world, with sparkling drinks and money to spend. The scent is citrusy, sparkling, softly sweet, and white earthly floral. <br />
<br />
I bought mandarino di amalfi first about a year ago. My conclusion is that owning both is redundant. They smell 90% similar with mandarino being more soapy and neroli being more green/floral. The overall composition in neroli portofino is a more complete, robust, and complex fragrance than mandarino. If I were to choose between the two neroli portofino wins. No problems with longevity for either of them.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2194230"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2194230#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187179" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2187179" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mcneil92"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148642"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="mcneil92" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2187179ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2187179" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148642">mcneil92</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-13">06/13/24 12:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This sits like lime juice on my skin. <br />
<br />
..and ONLY lime juice. ):</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2187179"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2187179#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182446" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Some have to push them to move Neroli at Signature Line .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2169015"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2169015#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2160332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2160332" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BestBohemianLife"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135455"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BestBohemianLife" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2160332ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2160332" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135455">BestBohemianLife</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-18">05/18/24 14:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Once, on a rainy day in Trastevere, I ducked into an Italian market to get out of the weather. I wound up buying a lovely bar of soap that I've not really been able to duplicate until this. (Strangely, given my love for neroli, I've never tried 4711, which is probably the closest thing and may replace NP given its price tag and poor longevity.)  NP is like standing in the Roman Forum when the orange blossoms are blooming while wearing something washed in natural lavender laundry detergent. While I see a lot of notes listed for this one, I really only get two: neroli and lavender. In fact, I can almost replicate it using essential oils (and they last just about as long).<br />
<br />
It's very clean and old fashioned, in a pleasant late 1800s, early 1900s kind of way. I'd say it's maybe slightly more feminine, but I wouldn't mind it on a man at all. It's fresh and soothing. But the cost for such a short-lived scent is prohibitive. Maybe a splurge but hard to justify the cost for a summer everyday scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2160332"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2160332#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2159332" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2159332" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="evann8"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2011154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="evann8" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2159332ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2159332" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);
