align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2159332"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2159332#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2152923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2152923" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="suzanne_ronald"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478553"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1478553.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="suzanne_ronald" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Demeter-Fragrance/Angel-Food-7742.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7742.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Food"title="Angel Food"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2152923ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2152923" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1478553">suzanne_ronald</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-11">05/11/24 14:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sea Breeze on the Italian Riviera...<br />
<br />
I initially got this back in 2015 or 2016, and at that time where I live it was only available in the men's store, Harry Rosen.  There was something that appealed to me about the simplicity, the dryness and the crisp, clean freshness.  Or maybe I was seduced by the bottle.  Anyway I didn't end up wearing it much back then, and found the performance poor.  Fast forward to 2024, through a few evolutions of loving other various orange-blossom &amp; neroli scents, and now I love it.  The performance is still moderate, but better than I remembered.  All the notes are there, but like most Tom Ford scents, it's really well blended and I predominantly get a crisp, sharp &amp; dry neroli &amp; orange-blossom scent that softens on the skin into a creamy, soapy citrus with a hint of sweetness.  It's simple yet upscale, and evokes clean skin &amp; yachting near the Italian Riviera, with a soft sea breeze drying your hair after taking a dip in the Ligurian Sea.  It's a love for me. 8/10.  Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2152923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2152923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151547" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151547" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Douk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2014862"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Douk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151547ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151547" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2014862">Douk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 07:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As much as I want to at least appreciate this fragrance,as much as I want to try to smell it for more than 5 seconds, I've smelt this 4 times at 3 different stores and this is genuinely one of, if not the most harrowing, repulsive and downright horrible fragrances I've smelt, this smells like cleaning spray to me that I would use to hide my cats vomit. And the price does not help in the slightest, nearly $300 bucks for a 50ml and to smell like complete shit. This fragrance is why I have such a mixed opinion on Tom Ford, it also doesn't help that apparently the performance is mediocre although I cant confirm that due to how horrendous the smell is. (Also I do NOT hate Tom Ford, this fragrance is simply the worst I've smelt)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2151547"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2151547#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145452" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2145452" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TonyG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291349"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1291349.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TonyG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Escentric-Molecules/Molecule-01-845.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.845.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Molecule 01"title="Molecule 01"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2145452ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2145452" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291349">TonyG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 08:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've just never understood why people will pay for garbage like this PURELY because it has the name TOM FORD on the bottle. No wonder there are so many wealthy people, who only get that way by the desperation and stupidity of people who want to look cool and keep up with the Joneses.This stuff legit smells like a generic brand lemon cleaner or about a dozen different scents you get from Bath and body works or any store that sells lemon fruity body spray. For the love of God stop encouraging these people and giving them wealth when they blatantly spend absolutely no care, money or originality by making a product that smells like either nothing or a million other things.yes it's a nice bottle but for that price that's the LEAST I expect to get. Tom Ford is the most overrated fragrance house in history. Yet he's laughing bathing in champagne because dummies keep buying his crappy products so they can say "look guys, Im wearing Tom Ford, even though it's generic piss water and I could buy 3 infinity better scents for the same price, I spent half my rent on it.........that makes me cool.......right guys!?" Maybe they used to make great fragrances, but they certainly don't now and haven't for years. Now they just shit in a bottle, give it a cringe name like "Mandarin Copulation" and stick a $400 price tag on it. <br />
T F.......Total Fraud.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2145452"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2145452#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2145231" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1612437">Vadangyal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 03:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My husband loves it, I hate it.<br />
My 65 year old aunt wore 4711 (20 years ago so this parfume is not unique at all) so i guess thats why, its too old on my husband for my taste.<br />
Price is also too high imo, just get 4711 instead.<br />
Silage is ok i guess medium, but like most TF parfumes i can only sense it for 3-4 hours.<br />
He wont get this one as a present from me, ever.<br />
Would rate this a 3/10, because i like the bottle, even though its the same color as the 4711 bottle haha.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2145231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2145231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2144601" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2141910" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dandy Perfume Boy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1372136"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1372136.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dandy Perfume Boy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Dear-Polly-30928.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30928.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dear Polly"title="Dear Polly"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2141910ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2141910" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1372136">Dandy Perfume Boy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-01">05/01/24 02:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Is Neroli Portofino a lovely summer scent in its crisp bittersweet lemony soapiness? Yes. Am I going to give the unimaginably wealthy Tom Ford a massive chunk of my hard-earned salary for it? No.<br />
<br />
My pro tip to anyone considering investing their money on this fragrance: get one of the gazillion similar summer juices in the market, or buy several bottles of 4711. They do the same job for a fraction of the price. Or do like I do and visit your nearest fragrance department for a sample spray of NP. That will get you an hour or two of smelling like the freshest citrus laundry detergent in the world, free of charge.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2141910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2141910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141873" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1903937">Chesf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 17:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I layered this with bath body iced lemon pound cake, it smells delicious<br />
<br />
The freshness and muskiness reminds me of NR for her.<br />
<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2134266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2134266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131114" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2131114" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Alexsod"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2068613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2068613.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Alexsod" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kajal/Lamar-Caviar-89056.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89056.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lamar Caviar"title="Lamar Caviar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2131114ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2131114" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2068613">Alexsod</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On paper I adore it! <br />
On skin it opens as mosquito repellent to dry down to a lovely citrus blossom scent with a bit soapy hint. <br />
So it lasts like a occasionally breeze for a couple of hours to only fade into thin air.<br />
Expensive and not worth the price for what it performs. Jo Malone Orange blossom projects far better and smells equally lovely for lower price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2131114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2131114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love it, the only reason I don't give it a perfect score is the longevity is mid, and the cost is so high.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2127680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2127680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2127041" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2127041" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saveria"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1847747.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saveria" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chopard/Casmir-348.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.348.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Casmir"title="Casmir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2127041ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2127041" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847747">Saveria</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 23:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Another Tom Ford, another disappointment.<br />
<br />
Neroli Portofino smells good, yes, I have no problem admitting that; a lovely smell of white flowers (especially neroli), orange blossom (quite intense to my nose) and citrus fruits. It's fresh, it smells like summer.<br />
<br />
But there is nothing transcendent, nothing crazy, nothing innovative about it. Nothing that could push me to pay as much money ! There are 36,000 fragrances in this style and at much lower prices.<br />
<br />
Plus the staying power is miserable... Next.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2127041"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2127041#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125233" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2115087" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SoheePark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/924022"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.924022.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SoheePark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/House-of-BO/Bombon-92543.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92543.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bombon"title="Bombon"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2115087ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2115087" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/924022">SoheePark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-05">04/05/24 07:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells slightly masculine and very crisp/ bitter. <br />
Life hack: This is the perfume I used during my trip to the Philippines and no mosquitos would come near me! Then I did some research and this perfume is packed with everything mosquitos hate!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2115087"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2115087#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2111225" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2111225" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sjfb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1918742"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1918742.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sjfb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2111225ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2111225" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1918742">sjfb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 18:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Vinegary, overly sharp opening that settles into a beautiful and pleasantly soapy orange blossom. Longevity not great (lower side of moderate) sillage ok, and as everyone knows by now, very overpriced. I recommend Al Haramain Neroli Canvas as an alternative, dry-down isnt quite as good but it performs better, is a third of the price and I would say it is better blended overall. If youre looking for a slightly greener and more feminine version of this try 002 from Bon Parfumeur, poor sillage but similar longevity, and still much cheaper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2111225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2111225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110482" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2110482" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ana Letic"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814696"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1814696.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ana Letic" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2110482ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2110482" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814696">Ana Letic</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-01">04/01/24 03:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this one. Reminiscent of summer in Italy :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2110482"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2110482#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2109366" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2109366" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TripleA"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583005"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TripleA" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nikos/Sculpture-Homme-925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sculpture Homme"title="Sculpture Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2109366ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2109366" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583005">TripleA</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-30">03/30/24 20:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly, this was a big let down for me, and it's a prime example of how brands use their name to price their products for way more than they deserve. The problem is that people are actually falling for it. <br />
<br />
That being said, this is my personal opinion, and I am not here to judge or discourage you from trying/buying it. This is only my personal verdict, since Tom Ford is not the only one that has been doing this in the world of fragrance.<br />
<br />
In terms of the scent, all I picked up on was neroli and maybe some lavender, nothing more. Don't get me wrong, I'm an absolute sucker for neroli, but it's literally the same smell as the colonia my grandfather would use.<br />
Of course, it's a weak fragrance as everyone else can agree.<br />
Personally, longevity is not something that necessarily draws me back from buying a fragrance. If you like a fragrance and are buying it knowing it has performance issues, then don't buy it expecting it to last all day if you do 20 sprays.<br />
<br />
All I'm trying to say here is that in the world of perfume, there has to be a much better neroli than this. At this point, just buy natural orange blossom oil instead. <br />
Anyhow you should never base your opinion on someone else's, especially in perfumery, This is just something I think more people should take note of...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2109366"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2109366#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2107652" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Worth it to me but maybe not others</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2094454"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2094454#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084330" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2084330" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gordon.moore9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1924270.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gordon.moore9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-Intense-45396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme Intense"title="Prada L'Homme Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2084330ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2084330" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924270">gordon.moore9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-06">03/06/24 12:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is an interesting one. It brings forth vibes of beaches, citrus, and a hint of sunscreen. It's undeniably pleasant, but when it comes to value, it falls short. I find myself reaching for it only when I'm out in the blazing heat, as it doesn't quite suit indoor settings, thanks to its rather assertive orange note.<br />
<br />
While it smells good, I can't ignore the fact that there are better options out there, especially considering the price point. I doubt I'll be repurchasing it due to its mediocre value proposition.<br />
<br />
In terms of longevity, it's a decent 6 out of 10, and the scent itself garners a 7.5 out of 10. Overall, it's a lukewarm 6.5 out of 10 for me. It's not bad, but it's not exceptional either.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2084330"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2084330#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2084297" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Its just so clean and fresh. The perfect summer scent. 10/10 for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2080270"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2080270#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2078754" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2078754" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JonahD2009"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036719"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2036719.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JonahD2009" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Lafayette-Street-51742.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51742.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lafayette Street"title="Lafayette Street"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2078754ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2078754" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2036719">JonahD2009</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-01">03/01/24 04:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this, I will repurchase this until the day I die. Also, the very few times I have worn it, I have gotten at least 8 hours on skin, with about 6 hours projecting. Wouldn't even come off after I shower!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2078754"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2078754#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2072196" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2072196" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scratch &amp; Sniff"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1878218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1878218.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scratch &amp; Sniff" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2072196ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2072196" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1878218">Scratch &amp; Sniff</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-23">02/23/24 22:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you enjoy unambitious citrus and outdated neroli scents, then have at it. Neroli Portofino might've been an exciting novelty in the early 2010s, when I first purchased it. But, like most Tom Ford fragrances, this scent has become as basic as the overpopulated and influencer-crowded beaches of Portofino itself.<br />
<br />
Based on Neroli Portofino's success, Tom Ford couldn't resist his narcissistic impulses to sell-out and dilute his brand with at least five dizzying additions and variations to his Italy-influenced collection (Sole di Positano, Fleur de Portofino, Costa Azzura, Mandarino Di Amalfi, and Neroli Portofino Acqua). Of all those scam-worthily similar scents, Costa Azzura is the only worthwhile, but Im quite certain its been discontinued.<br />
<br />
If you really want to buy this, I wont stop you. But Neroli Portofino is the perfume equivalent of the umpteenth photo youve seen posted on Instagram from the beaches of Italy last summer. Just like how influencers and tourists don't understand how to find the hidden best spots in Italy, the mainstream will flock to this fragrance. You can do better.<br />
<br />
In five words or less: Portofino is poor, basic taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2072196"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2072196#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2069184" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2069184" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Johnnyboy719"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712156"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1712156.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Johnnyboy719" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Cedrat-Boise-15211.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15211.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cedrat Boise"title="Cedrat Boise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2069184ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2069184" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1712156">Johnnyboy719</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-21">02/21/24 05:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There's nothing not to like about this fragrance, IMO. It smells like expensive sun tan lotion with a little floral flare running underneath. I will say that this is a very feminine scent. I can see a guy wearing this to the beach but beyond that I would opt for something more masculine for a Summer scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2069184"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2069184#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells divine on both men and women, its got a long lasting fragrance that is delicious in hot summers with linen shirts and dresses but equally seductive on a night out. I just wish it wasnt so expensive!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2067946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2067946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2065903" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2055663"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2055663#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053018" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2053018" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fubar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995890"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1995890.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fubar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2053018ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2053018" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995890">fubar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-05">02/05/24 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, citrus, floral. A great summertime freshie for any outdoor day, maybe at a theme park or at a pool. <br />
Imagine being at a beach and eating fresh oranges, surrounded by lush fauna and flora. <br />
This is that, in a bottle. The delicious citruses combine with a fresh and powdery/ muted floral to create a lovely scent. <br />
Definitely expensive, but you get what you paid for. Definitely seasonal, but god damn you'll smell good during.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2053018"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2053018#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2050893" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yvmm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1368915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1368915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yvmm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/APOM-95969.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95969.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="APOM"title="APOM"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2050893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2050893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); There's not a touch of sweetness in it, which in this one I miss. Smells clean but also a bit distant, doesn't invite someone in, doesn't feel welcoming.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2050893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2050893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2050867" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; STUNNING fragrance, definitely a unisex scent but has such a beautiful delicate quality about it. I wear this year round, it may be my signature at this point. Sillage is OK, unfortunately only lasts on my skin for a max of 3 hours, but it's so addicting I'll overlook it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2039639"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2039639#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2038586" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I've seen reviews of this and wanted to try it out didn't expect this smell WOW! <br />
Either way I don't recommend it if you want something similar to this try Mandarino di Amalfi it's a much better fragrance.<br />
<br />
Longevity 7/10<br />
Projection 6/10<br />
Scent 3/10<br />
Overall 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2038586"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2038586#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023428" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023428" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kadzko"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1861821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kadzko" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023428ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023428" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1861821">kadzko</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 08:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>smells like turkish hand santicizer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2023428"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2023428#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2023246" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2023246" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rochae"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1434910"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rochae" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2023246ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2023246" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1434910">Rochae</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-07">01/07/24 04:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>While the fragrance is pleasant and gentle, its weak longevity and slightly old-fashioned scent make it less appealing in terms of value for money. The herbal notes reminiscent of Turkish barber cologne and the soapy florals evoke a sense of nostalgia, but they may not be everyone's cup of tea. Overall, the fragrance is not a bad choice for those seeking a gentle, familiar scent, but its shortcomings could deter those seeking a more modern and long-lasting fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2023246"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2023246#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018545" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018545" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Bois-D-Argent-48396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bois D'Argent"title="Bois D'Argent"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018545ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018545" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 01:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wore this one on a warm day about a week ago (got a decant from the store) after not having worn it for years. Still an all star. People complain about performance (myself included) but my most recent test wearing I got about 6-7 hours on my skin, and I only remember getting 3-4 before. It (2023 batch) seemed a bit more indolic than I remember but not bothersome. Love this and the 4711 family of scents. <br />
----------------------------------------------------------------<br />
Scent 9/10<br />
Performance 6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2018545"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2018545#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2014752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1333034">Irvdaman15$</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-29">12/29/23 21:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The reviews below about this smelling like childhood is also very true for me. <br />
This reminds me of youthful days in L.A, and either the smell of fresh clean laundry with the orange blossom flowers sparks that memory.<br />
10/10.<br />
Light and lasts a good while. Over spraying can be a bit much for others around your scent bubble of around 5-6 feet. The drydown is very lovely almost too good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2014752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2014752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2014650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Beautiful light floral-citrusy frag. Smells like a laundry detergent of rich to me.<br />
Is it good? Yes.<br />
Is it worth buying? No. Especially considering the performance it offers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2010084"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2010084#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2007293" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1895165">Equilton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-20">12/20/23 13:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like Turkish barber Cologne.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2005128" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DariaFrancesca74"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537588"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1537588.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DariaFrancesca74" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2005128ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2005128" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537588">DariaFrancesca74</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-19">12/19/23 07:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A fresh and tart citrus fragrance that evokes sunny and lush Mediterranean summer atmospheres: bergamot, lemon and rosemary in their maximum expression, a blend that solemnly brings out the neroli note immersed in the crystalline purity of the clear notes of the lavender and jasmine bouquet. A base of precious and reassuring woods and amber that warm the fragrance and make it persistent over time. Temporal olfactory evolution makes the fresh cleanliness of lavender remain on the skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="2005128"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=2005128#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1999872" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1999872" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xdwward"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843359"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1843359.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="xdwward" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1999872ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1999872" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1843359">xdwward</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-12">12/12/23 22:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The best neroli perfume out there, and made me into a fraghead that I am today. Longevity and bang for the buck are the top issues.<br />
<br />
Note: review is based on tropical, humid climate</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="12192"comment_id="1999872"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Neroli-Portofino-12192.html?ccid=1999872#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1971003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1971003" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stella.cherie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1692603"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="stella.cherie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/DS-Durga/Debaser-29736.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29736.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Debaser"title="Debaser"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1971003ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1971003" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); Emphasis on the soap. As with all Tom Ford scents I've tested so far (except for Bitter Peach), longevity and projection are a joke, especially at these price points.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
